column5: Thanks to advice here, I took chip to a computer store, where they recovered it. muskiepic.htm
What the heck??.....apparently I have forgotten how to post a picture>
sometimes nice muskies can be so elusive even the picture gets away
Congrats on getting the pic back!!  Thanks for letting us know - I was wondering how you'd made out.  CCMT's guide to posting pics should get you set up in no time.
